backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, leadership word submissions with counts, and resilient leadership activity storage using access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two UI features, their components, linked files, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short descriptions summarizing the purpose of each frontend component and page.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables defining light and dark theme palettes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point providing root container and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes and React Query provider.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Application shell with header navigation, auth controls, responsive mobile menu, and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/components/HeroBanner.tsx: Reusable hero banner displaying a background image with title and optional subtitle overlay.
frontend/src/components/LeadershipWordPa: Component fetching and displaying top leadership word counts with optional polling and bar visualization.
frontend/src/components/MicroSolutionsCo: Displays a list of community micro‑solutions with optional polling and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/components/PageSection.tsx: Wrapper component that renders children inside a styled, responsive page section.
frontend/src/components/SignInGate.tsx: Gates content behind Internet Identity authentication and shows a sign‑in prompt when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/content/movieReferences.ts: Exports a list of movie and film‑series citation strings used in activities and the references page.
frontend/src/content/proposalContent.ts: Provides structured text content for a proposal, including metadata, bios, abstracts, and learning outcomes.
frontend/src/content/references.ts: Defines a typed list of academic reference entries used across the app for consistent citation access.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and submitting leadership words and resilient leadership activities with optimistic updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ActivitiesPage.tsx: Renders a landing page listing two activities with descriptions and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/Activity1LeadershipWo: Implements Activity 1 form flow for submitting leadership words and generating affirmations with backend quotes.
frontend/src/pages/Activity2ResilientLea: Implements Activity 2 submission flow for resilient leadership challenges and generating validation with backend quotes.
frontend/src/pages/BioPage.tsx: Displays author biography, organization info, and links to social profiles and experiences.
frontend/src/pages/LeadershipBoardPage.t: Shows community leadership word patterns and micro‑solutions with live polling.
Renders a page showing learning outcomes using content from proposalContent with styled sections and icons.
frontend/src/pages/MovieReferencesPage.t: Displays a list of movie references with descriptions, pulling data from movieReferences.
frontend/src/pages/OverviewPage.tsx: Shows the abstract and full abstract from proposalContent and provides quick navigation links to activities and learning outcomes.
frontend/src/pages/ReferencesPage.tsx: Lists academic references from REFERENCES in styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/SessionOutlinePage.ts: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/SlidesPage.tsx: Provides access to session slides with a displayed QR code.
frontend/src/pages/TakeawaysPage.tsx: Displays key takeaways from proposalContent with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/utils/activity1Affirmations: Generates affirmation messages and selects academic references based on leadership-related inputs.
frontend/src/utils/activity2Validation.t: Detects themes in user inputs, selects a matching reference, and builds validation messages for activity 2.
Maps UI challenge type keys to backend ChallengeType enum variants.
frontend/src/utils/isVillainousInput.ts: Checks text for negative or harmful keywords to flag villainous input.
frontend/src/utils/quoteFormatting.ts: Converts backend QuoteGenre enum values into user-facing franchise labels.
frontend/src/utils/referenceSelection.ts: Validates reference entries and selects valid references deterministically or randomly based on input.
frontend/src/utils/starWarsQuotes.ts: Defines a StarWarsQuote interface, a list of curated Star Wars quotes, and a deterministic quote selector.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Maps unknown or technical error values into user-friendly English messages with specific handling for common backend and network errors.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, features, and requirements related to adding a moat-and-trees footer graphic across tab pages.
